title: 'Santa' Putin's special gifts for world leaders stun all; Zelensky gets shocked? Russian AI surprise
description: Watch as AI-generated 'Santa' Putin delivers shocking Christmas gifts to world leaders! From PM Modi and Donald Trump to Xi Jinping, Nicolás Maduro, Kim Jong-un, Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, and even Volodymyr Zelensky, the video mixes satire, geopolitics, and holiday surprises. Who got a gift and who faced a savage jibe? Find out in this viral AI-powered Christmas spectacle!

title: Ralph AI Coding Plugin : Helps Claude Finish Any Task Effeciently
description: What if the key to unlocking unparalleled efficiency in your development workflow was hiding in plain sight? Better Stack outlines how a seemingly quirky plugin, born from a bash loop and named after a lovable cartoon character, has quietly transformed into a innovative feature for developers. This isn’t just another coding gimmick, Anthropic’s Ralph plugin [...]The post Ralph AI Coding Plugin : Helps Claude Finish Any Task Effeciently appeared first on Geeky Gadgets.

title: AI PC Performance Guide: Why NPUs Matter More Than CPUs Now
description: AI PC Performance Guide: Why laptops stopped chasing speed and started thinking, from NPUs and TOPS to GPUs, batteries, and invisible AI doing the real work.

title: Meta’s multibillion Manus buyout draws plaudits, but raises spectre of a China AI exodus
description: Meta Platforms’ multibillion-dollar acquisition of Manus, a Chinese-founded artificial intelligence agent start-up, has set off a mix of excitement and unease in China’s tech circles, opening what some see as a new “cash-out” route for AI entrepreneurs beyond the traditional IPO playbook.Industry observers said the acquisition was made possible by two key developments: Manus’ progress in building a globally competitive general AI agent and the founders’ decision to relocate the business...

title: The Biggest Stories in AI
